newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Energy restarts 110,000 bpd Mizushima topper.
newsitem.headline: Japan Energy restarts 110,000 bpd Mizushima topper.

text.p: Japan Energy Corp said it restarted a 110,000 bpd crude distillation unit at its Mizushima plant on Friday. The unit had been closed since December 18 after a gas leak.
"We put the topper back on line soon after local authorities gave us the go-ahead to restart it at 5 p.m. (0800 GMT)," a Japan Energy spokesman told Reuters.
The refiner shut down the unit and related facilities, located in Okayama Prefecture in western Japan, after it detected a hydrogen gas leak from a desulphurisation unit.
